Footer.text: Discover the unique beauty of Antalya, the gem of the Mediterranean, with its pristine beaches, mysterious ancient ruins, and lush greenery.

Amenities.text: High-quality service and bohemian-style interlane with care in Ni Hotel

Rooms.title: Standard Room
Rooms.description: Our spacious 25 m² Standard Room features one double bed and one twin bed, thoughtfully appointed for comfort. Refresh in a private bathroom with modern amenities. Ideal for families or friends seeking a restful retreat.
Rooms.description2: Cozy 20 m² Junior Room appointed with one double bed and a private bathroom for your comfort. Designed for solo travelers or couples, it offers a welcoming and intimate atmosphere. Enjoy essential amenities for a seamless stay.
Rooms.description3: The 25 m² Veranda Room features one double bed and one twin bed, along with a private veranda overlooking serene garden views. Perfect for enjoying morning coffee or evening relaxation. A well-equipped bathroom and thoughtful amenities enhance your stay.
Rooms.description4: Located in the corner for extra privacy and natural light, our 25 m² Corner Room includes one double bed and a private bathroom. Spaciously designed with comfortable seating and modern conveniences. Ideal for guests seeking a tranquil retreat.

RoomFeatures.rulesDetails: Check-In: 02:00 PM Check-Out: 12:00 PM No Smoking

CornerRoom.carouselDesc1: Our rooms, each 30 m², with a balcony and garden view, have been designed in a tasteful way, with your comfort in mind, featuring a large bed or two single beds, a desk and chairs.
CornerRoom.carouselDesc2: Ni Hotel makes your holiday amazing with bohemian style. This room was designed with care. Light and color will upgrade your mood for your dream holiday.

DiscoverRoom.description1: 25 m², 1 French bed + 1 Twin bed, toilet & bathroom
DiscoverRoom.description3: 25 m², 1 French bed + 1 Twin bed, toilet & bathroom

RoomsSlider.text: Discover thoughtfully designed spaces—from cozy Standard rooms to spacious Corner suites—each offering modern amenities and elegant comfort.

Contact.description: Reach out via phone, email, or use the chat in the bottom right corner. Click “Let Us Call You” for a callback.
Contact.text: NiHotel is in Konyaaltı, just steps from the Mediterranean. Our team is available 24/7 for bookings, service info, or any special request.

About.text1: Located in the heart of Antalya—Turkey’s “turquoise paradise”—just steps from the tranquil streets of Konyaaltı and its Blue Flag beaches, NiHotel combines modern comfort with genuine Turkish hospitality. Our 12 Standard, 3 Junior, 4 Veranda, and 6 Corner rooms are equipped with a 42″ LED TV, central air conditioning, in-room safe, mini-bar, and complimentary bathroom amenities.
About.text2: A rich buffet breakfast is included with every stay, and our 24/7 reception team is on hand to assist with reservations, tour planning, special requests, or visits to nearby Düden Waterfalls and the Ancient Castle.

RoomTour.text: Take a fully interactive 360° tour of our room. View every detail—from the bed and bathroom to the stunning views—in lifelike clarity.

DiscoverRoom.description1: 25 m², 1 French bed + 1 Twin bed, toilet & bathroom
DiscoverRoom.description3: 25 m², 1 French bed + 1 Twin bed, toilet & bathroom

Nibeauty.title: The Path to Health and Beauty
Nibeauty.text: We offer services such as skin care, localized slimming, spa treatments, hand and foot care, laser hair removal, permanent makeup, and mesotherapy—combining the latest methods and technology to help you achieve a healthier, higher-quality life.

Kitchen.text1: Hand-picked coffee beans release their wonderful aroma to refresh your energy at any hour, while our bar is ready for pleasant conversations with a selection of alcoholic and non-alcoholic drinks tailored to diverse palates.
Kitchen.text2: The unique flavors crafted by our chef, blending national and international cuisines, take your stay at Ni Hotel Lara to the next level.
